post.author: Admin
post.title: Volunteer Needed - Forms/Data Manager
post.description: Forms/Data Manager A volunteer to handle the band booster's online form processing and data collecti
post.content:
Forms/Data Manager

A volunteer to handle the band booster's online form processing and data collection duties. With the move away from paper forms, the Boosters and Band are now handling registration and volunteer data collection via online forms. We are looking for a person with good organizational skills to collect and process the data and periodically forward the information to the Booster Communications Coordinator and the Band Director. You will need to have a good working knowledge of Microsoft Excel. Training and support are available. The task typically takes just 1-2 hours a week during the busy Spring registration period and even less time the rest of the year.

For more information and/or to volunteer, please contact Art Semple (asemple@yahoo.com, 440-582-1593) or Becky Humes (bgnetmail-pta@yahoo.com, 440-582-3504).

Thanks!
